Message.MsgText: ERROR_CROSSVALIDATING_DATA=XBGA0102E: Unable to cross-validate data specified for long-running scheduler.
ERROR_INVALID_DATASOURCE_JNDI_NAME=XBGA0100E: The datasource JNDIName specified does not exists.
Message.Explanation: The datasource JNDIName specified is not a valid resource on the system.
Message.UserResponse: Make sure the datasource is created before configuring the long-running scheduler.

Message.MsgText: ERROR_INVALID_DATASOURCE_ALIAS=XBGA0101E: The datasource alias specified does not exists.
Message.Explanation: The datasource alias specified is not a valid resource on the system.
Message.UserResponse: Make sure the alias is created before configuring the long-running scheduler.
